wikipedia_page.main: Tom "Tommy" Thomas (birth unknown) was a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s. He played at club level for Wigan and Merthyr Tydfil, as a centre, i.e. number 3 or 4.

response: Tom Thomas was a baseball player.
Tom Thomas may also refer to:
*Tom Thomas (rugby league), Welsh rugby league footballer
*Thomas Thomas (boxer), known as Tom Thomas (1880-1911), Welsh boxer
